name: Pokettohiro!
description:
The adventure begins!

Welcome to the world of Pokettohiro! A new action/adventure game developed for Game Boy Color.

In this game, a group of brave heroes must gather the fragments of the magic crystal to face the evil Black Knight and thus prevent the destruction of the kingdom. But it will not be an easy task, for this they will have to overcome countless obstacles, defeat huge monsters and visit all kinds of places. Will these little heroes be able to restore peace to the kingdom?

Trailer

Features

  • Unlock 6 playable characters, each with their own abilities.
  • Visit a wide variety of settings: grasslands, deserts, volcanoes, beaches, even the sky!
  • Unravel the secrets of the dungeons and defeat their huge bosses.
  • Complete the numerous side quests from the villagers.
Development

Pokettohiro! is currently under development. In this demo you will be able to enjoy the first stage of the game. If you have any feedback,  or  issue reports, please leave a comment . Thanks for playing!

Controls ACTIONGAME BOY COLORKEYBOARDMoveD-PadArrow Keys
Jump/InteractAZAttack/CancelBXOpen DoorsD-Pad UpArrow UpMenuStart EnterInventorySelectShift Credits

This game has been programed and designed by David Marín, using Chris Maltby's GB Studio engine featuring music by Matías Sosa.
